data.title: Kitchen Jobs for Cooking Careers
data.meta_description: Interested in a kitchen job, teaching, and furthering your cooking career? Join the Taste Buds Kitchen team at one of our various locations. Apply today!
data.text:
We have incredible career opportunities in each of our growing Kitchen Studios nationwide, as well as our corporate office. Check out our open positions below or apply in person at your location of choice.

Perfect for culinary professionals, passionate foodies, teachers, managers, administrators, marketers and college and high school students alike!

Taste Buds Kitchen is a fun work environment that encourages creativity and a social atmosphere between employees and clients. Good benefits, great pay, and just a very enjoyable place to work!

– Happy Team Member

General Managers play a critical role in the success of Taste Buds Kitchen. You will have the skills and experience to drive sales, manage the day-to-day operations and staff in our Kitchen, create an exceptional client experience and be a natural leader. This is the perfect opportunity to interact with clients on a daily basis to create a supportive and meaningful community.

Culinary Instructors are the lifeblood of our brand. We are looking for high energy individuals who are passionate about food and inspiring those around them to have fun in the Kitchen. Responsible for the success of the event from start to finish, you are as comfortable engaging kids as you are with adults and corporate events; as passionate about chiffonading basil as you are about rolling fresh pasta and decorating cupcakes. Culinary Instructors are responsible for leading a minimum of five classes per week.

Culinary Assistants are the ones who help make the magic happen. From assisting the Instructor, to preparing the recipes and keeping the Kitchen clean and organized, you will have a passion for making our guests smile and keeping everything running smoothly in our sparkling clean Kitchens. Culinary Instructors are responsible for assisting a minimum of five classes per week.

Sales Administrators have the important role of engaging with clients on a daily basis and keeping us organized. This is the perfect opportunity for someone who is passionate about sales and administration.

Based out of our headquarters in Chester, MD, Taste Buds Kitchen employees play a pivotal role in bringing together a diverse background of experience and skills that is focused on creating the best possible Taste Buds Kitchen experience for our franchisee and our clients.

Taste Buds Kitchen International, LLC is a franchisor that offers Taste Buds Kitchen franchises for sale. These franchises are independently owned and operated. Taste Buds Kitchen International, LLC is not the employer of its franchisees’ employees and does not control the terms and conditions of their employment, including but not limited to, issues involving: compensation, benefits, schedules, hiring, firing, or discipline. Employees at franchised locations are not joint employees of Taste Buds Kitchen International, LLC. Your ability to apply for employment at franchised locations via this website is for convenience purposes only.
